channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Moves Closer to an Actual War in Venezuela
item.description: It would be a colossal mistake for the president to glide into a war in South America for which he sought no public support or congressional buy-in.

item.title: Cruz 'cannot support' Trump's Kuwait ambassador pick over Muslim Brotherhood remarks
item.description: Hamtramck Mayor Amer Ghalib faced bipartisan opposition during a contentious confirmation hearing for the Kuwait ambassador role over controversial so...

item.title: Ontario premier says anti-tariff ads will stop airing after early World Series games
item.description: Ontario Premier Doug Ford says he will run anti-tariff commercials that enraged President Trump during the first two games of the World Series before ...

item.title: Hakeem Jeffries finally endorses Zohran Mamdani in New York mayor's race
item.description: House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries has endorsed Democratic socialist Zohran Mamdani in New York City's mayoral race after facing weeks of questions...

item.title: Ontario quickly caves to Trump and promises to pull the offending Reagan ad that killed Canada trade talks
item.description: Days before he called the ad fraudulent, Trump told a group of Republican senators that he'd take out the same ad if he were Canadian.

item.title: I’ve worked in AI for decades. Agentic AI will irreversibly change our workforce whether enterprises like it or not
item.description: I've spent over 25 years working in AI & Digital, and we're past the point of asking if the technology will transform work. The question is how fast.

item.title: After Microsoft invested $13 billion into OpenAI, its AI chief is slamming erotica features like ChatGPT’s: ‘This is very dangerous’
item.description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman defended a newly announced erotica feature for ChatGPT, saying his company is “not the elected moral police of the world.”

item.title: These 2 states will determine if the U.S. slips into a recession while one more enters the danger zone, top economist says
item.description: “This state-level picture mirrors the national trend: The U.S. economy is not in recession, but it is struggling to avoid one.”

item.title: America’s Gambling Problem
item.description: We’ve created an enormous industry that is inherently corrupting, encourages people to waste their money, and ruins lives.

item.title: Springsteen’s Self-Mythologizing Home Movie
item.description: A showbiz rock ’n’ roll version of Hamilton .

item.title: If You Care More About Policing The Right Than Fighting The Left, You’re Part Of The Problem
item.description: We have created a demoralized right, perpetually apologizing for existing while the left advances unimpeded.

item.title: Fox News Politics Newsletter: Zohran Mamdani lands key NYC mayoral endorsement
item.description: Welcome to the Fox News Politics newsletter, with the latest updates on the Trump administration, Capitol Hill and more Fox News politics content.

item.title: Trump Should Drop His Damages Claim Against DOJ

item.title: White House responds to reports Trump named new ballroom after himself

item.title: DOJ sends federal election watchers to California and New Jersey counties amid Republican requests

item.title: Obama’s ‘wingman’ dumps $300K into new Virginia redistricting fight as Dems call lawmakers back
